I am a Staff Product Designer at CNN, working to establish and scale our Design System Language.

Currently laser-focused on launching an end-to-end Figma to code pipeline, empowering designers to publish and maintain accessible design systems at scale.

These days, you can find me diving head-first into CNNâ€™s design system language that enriches immersive story-telling experiences delivered to people across the world. I consider myself a mission-driven designer with lofty ambitions to enrich and empower the world, through impactful storytelling, to inform a better future.

Prior to my current role, I lead product design initiatives for a range of products in video, community and a variety of funded 0:1 products. I thrive in ambiguity, and love sinking my teeth into a rich problem space that puts me out of my comfort zone.

This work taken me around the world and back, spanning a number of industries, verticals, and focus-areas across responsive web, mobile apps and connected TV. Life is a garden, so dig it... err... lemons, lemonade.
